version_description:
With a refreshed look and feel in line with The National Lottery’s new branding, the latest version of the App is a complete upgrade on the previous version.

We have addressed many of the issues that you have reported to us, including: improved na

- Experience Enhancements
- Bug Fixes

- Updates to support upcoming Lotto game changes
- Bug Fixes
- Bug Fixes

We’ve made some changes to the app which we hope you'll love:

- A fresh new look home screen with quicker access to checking and playing our games.
- Next jackpot information is now shown on the home screen so you can join the excitement.
- A

We’ve made some more changes to the app which we hope you’ll love:
 
- We’ve listened to your feedback about sending you out to the website to access your account information and have introduced a more integrated experience.
- The

- Be the first to know about the latest draw information with Push Notifications. Make sure you stay opted-in for official updates from The National Lottery.

- Spring has sprung so we’ve had our own Spring Clean. You’ll notice a more refreshing loo

Ticket Scanning –
You will be able to scan your retail ticket to see if it’s a winner! Its super-fast and we’re sure you’re going to love it. We are so excited to be launching this ‘very soon’ and you won’t even need to update the app.

Hotpicks

- We really do listen to your feedback and read every review. We also know how much you love playing Lotto Hotpicks so we have improved the experience and made the game work fully within the app!

- There has been an update to The National Lottery p

Whilst we've been watching the success of Team GB in Rio we have also been cleaning up the app to keep it as fast and reliable as our athletes!

We have given you quite a lot of new features in the last few updates and whilst you still get used to t

- We have added support for third party password managers making it even easier for you to log into your account now
- Improved support for iOS10
- We’ve squashed a number of those pesky bugs making the app run a bit zippier for you
- There are

•Fix for offline error journey that affected a small minority of players.
•Improved support for iOS10.
•Ability to copy & paste from third party password managers to allow players to login easier into your accounts.

- Fix for 'See previous draws' issue that affected a small minority of players
- Clearer result messages when scanning a ticket
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

General performance improvements
The new app now supports all iOS9 (or later) iPhones

We have fixed an issue where some players' My Saved Numbers were deleted from the app.
General performance improvements
Play our new game, EuroMillions HotPicks, and the Thunderball Tuesday draw.

- Play our new game, EuroMillions HotPicks, and the Thunderball Tuesday draw.
- Minor design improvements.

Touch ID is here! It's the easiest and quickest way to sign in and play. We always listen to your feedback and look to make our App even better. Look out for more sign in improvements coming soon!

●We’ve also fixed bugs and made minor improvements

We are constantly listening to feedback and trying to make improvements to the overall experience of our app. This release includes:
iPhone X Screen Improvements
Design Improvements and Bug Fixes

This change includes our updated Privacy Polic
In this release players can now store their username or email at sign in, so you can play the games you love quicker.
This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements
This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

We've updated the app with an enhanced version of Instant Win Games, all games are now fully playable directly in the app.

With a significantly improved journey, bringing better navigation and sorting, you can easily filter and find the right game

Face ID support is now available - one of our most requested features. (Supported by the iPhone X, XR, XS, XS Max and the latest iPad Pro.)
With Face ID, you can quickly sign in to buy any of our lottery tickets, view your account details or play an In

Launch of our new game Set For Life, available from 15th March!
Vastly improved experience for adding and withdrawing funds from your National Lottery account
Fixed a defect in the Face ID and Touch ID plugin that was causing users who updated from

Launch of our new game Set For Life, available from 15th March!
Vastly improved experience for adding and withdrawing funds from your National Lottery account
Fixed a defect in the Face ID and Touch ID plugin that was causing users who updated from

Added new accessibility support across multiple app journeys and menus
Defect and performance fixes for customer reported issues

• We've improved the overall account registration process within the mobile app
• You can now create an account and easily continue to play any of our fantastic games, all directly through the app
• Improved support for Accessibility across addition

- With the National Lottery’s commitment to continually improving our customers' in-app experience we have focused on fixing a number of priority bugs that our customers have told us about in this release

This is a small update with fixes to customer reported defects

- We have extended our Responsible Play controls so all customers can limit their maximum weekly spend
- Fixed an issue that sometimes caused players to purchase a ticket twice if their connection failed during the original purchase
